verbs.description: The White House [V: is] standing by President Donald Trump 's nominee for Veterans Affairs secretary amid emerging allegations of workplace misconduct .
[ARG1: The White House] is [V: standing] [ARG2: by President Donald Trump 's nominee for Veterans Affairs secretary] [ARGM-LOC: amid emerging allegations of workplace misconduct] .
The White House is standing by President Donald Trump 's nominee for Veterans Affairs secretary amid [V: emerging] [ARG0: allegations] of workplace misconduct .
